医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新发现为肺动脉高压提供饮食解决方案肺部的血管与体内其他血管不同。这种差异在肺动脉高压中变得很明显，只有肺部血管逐渐变硬，导致慢性肺病、心力衰竭和死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/New-discovery-offers-dietary-solution-for-pulmonary-hypertension.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/New-discovery-offers-dietary-solution-for-pulmonary-hypertension.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b6cfc2b-4aed-4bed-ae8a-2bf55e76c99d Thu, 02 May 2024 22:09:20 -0400 New discovery offers dietary solution for pulmonary hypertension
研究人员强调，患有细菌性阴道病的女性迫切需要更有效的治疗方法细菌性阴道病 (BV) 影响约四分之一的育龄妇女，并与不良健康结果相关，例如艾滋病毒风险增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Researchers-highlight-ritic-need-for-more- effective-treatments-for-women-with-bacterial-vaginosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Researchers-highlight-ritic-need-for-more- effective-treatments-for-women-with-bacterial-vaginosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0f84431-eff3-495d-baeb-403ec4963dc9 Thu, 02 May 2024 22:00:46 -0400 Researchers highlight critical need for more effective treatments for women with bacterial vaginosis
新的评分系统可识别冠状动脉介入治疗的风险新数据表明，基于三个简单基线血管造影结果的左主干 (LM) 分叉特异性新型评分系统 (LM V-RESOLVE) 有助于快速区分经皮 LM 分叉期间存在侧支 (SB) 闭塞风险的病变冠状动脉介入治疗 (PCI) – 降低手术过程中的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/New-scoring-system-identizes-risks-in-coronary-artery-interventions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/New-scoring-system-identizes-risks-in-coronary-artery-interventions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17edb708-fd07-4b71-9b03-8cd511eb9aec Thu, 02 May 2024 21:39:54 -0400 New scoring system identifies risks in coronary artery interventions
研究发现社会和心理因素会加剧青少年在屏幕时间对超加工食品的渴望最近的一项研究探讨了青少年在屏幕时间如何感知和消费超加工食品，揭示了社会、环境和心理因素对这些行为的强烈影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Study-finds-social-and-psychological-factors-fuel-teen-cravings-for-ultra-processed-foods-during-screen-time.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Study-finds-social-and-psychological-factors-fuel-teen-cravings-for-ultra-processed-foods-during-screen-time.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2497006-d868-4f3b-a706-a0decc77eec6 Thu, 02 May 2024 21:01:00 -0400 Study finds social and psychological factors fuel teen cravings for ultra-processed foods during screen time
黄酮类化合物可以增强认知功能吗？最近《营养》杂志上的一项研究将类黄酮摄入量与改善认知功能联系起来，尽管研究结果表明需要进一步研究来了解其对不同人群的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Do-flavonoids-enhance-cognitive-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Do-flavonoids-enhance-cognitive-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5df2bdce-e2a7-494d-85fb-2dd34815a8eb Thu, 02 May 2024 20:49:00 -0400 Do flavonoids enhance cognitive function?
研究受精 ACL 手术对运动员重返赛场的影响马歇尔大学琼·C·爱德华兹医学院现正在接受一项观察性试验的申请者，该试验的重点是受精前十字韧带 (ACL) 重建。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Investigating-ifered-ACL-surgerys-impact-on-return-to-play-in-athletes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Investigating-ifered-ACL-surgerys-impact-on-return-to-play-in-athletes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=593ff554-bc08-4568-b85c-86401d72db01 Thu, 02 May 2024 16:30:48 -0400 Investigating fertilized ACL surgery's impact on return to play in athletes
蛋白质分析揭示衰老和阻力训练对骨骼肌蛋白质组的影响一篇新的研究论文发表在《Aging》（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”和 Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 16 卷第 8 期，题为“A new deep proteomic method in human skeletal肌肉揭示了受衰老和阻力训练影响的独特分子特征。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Protein-profiling-reveals-impact-of-aging-and-resistance-training-on-skeletal-muscle-proteome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Protein-profiling-reveals-impact-of-aging-and-resistance-training-on-skeletal-muscle-proteome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cbf4a1ac-b401-4ff0-b9e9-f8231c7ace6e Thu, 02 May 2024 16:26:30 -0400 Protein profiling reveals impact of aging and resistance training on skeletal muscle proteome

小罗伯特·肯尼迪 (Robert F. Kennedy Jr.) 关于禁止 NIH 研究大规模枪击事件的说法是错误的​美国国立卫生研究院是联邦政府支持医学研究的主要机构。它是否被禁止研究大规模枪击事件？这是总统候选人小罗伯特·F·肯尼迪最近所说的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Robert-F-Kennedy-Jr-Is-Wrong-About-A-Ban-On-NIH-Research-About-Mass-Shootings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Robert-F-Kennedy-Jr-Is-Wrong-About-A-Ban-On-NIH-Research-About-Mass-Shootings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e84cb1a-8c55-4ba2-b329-d91fd86c30d1 Thu, 02 May 2024 16:15:00 -0400 Robert F. Kennedy Jr. is wrong about a ban on NIH research about mass shootings
